column4: hi everyone. While I have been a linux user/admin and what not I am new to the install process to Ubunto. Seems fairly easy and strait forward. The real issue why my install failed may or may not have to do with a possible disk error but not sure. When I got to the partition of the drive, set up the root partion as ex3 and swap as 10-12% respectivly of the hard drive. I got the error of "the creation of swap space in partion
cut off at "swap space in partion"
